description: Created dedicated Notes page with ultra-robust persistence - notes will NEVER be lost
security_features: Triple backup system: primary + backup1 + backup2
Automatic recovery from any backup if primary fails
Save count tracking and metadata storage
Visual feedback for all save operations
ui_features: Modern dedicated page with green header theme
Large writing area with serif font for readability
Real-time character count and save status
Manual save button with visual feedback

user_experience.guarantee: Notes will NEVER be lost - even if page closes, browser crashes, or reset occurs
